The explanation effectively addresses the concern by highlighting the importance of understanding the fundamental concept of resurrection for comprehending Christian beliefs about life after death. The only room for improvement could be to provide a bit more depth or elaboration on how this belief in resurrection impacts Christian theology or practices.
